createSeedPhrase.title: Secret recovery words
createSeedPhrase.warningMessage: If you lose these words, **you will lose access to your wallet**, it is recommended to keep them written on paper, or in some other physical medium **without internet access**.

inputs.passwordError:
Password must has 8 characters long.
At least 1 upper case.
At least 1 number.
Special character are not allowed
inputs.seedPhraseErrorLength: The number of secret words is incorrect.
